str2: So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: I am acted upon in a certain way, either good or bad; I experience ill treatment, suffer.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
An act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires. From the prolonged form of ethelo; a determination, i.e. choice or inclination.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and tithemi; to place alongside, i.e. Present; by implication, to deposit.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.
(often of the founder of a city), creator, God. From ktizo; a founder, i.e. God.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The doing of that which is good, well-doing. From agathopoios; well-doing, i.e. Virtue.
